topic: How to profile event-driven systems using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to profile event-driven systems using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Profiling Event-Driven Systems Using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide will walk you through profiling event-driven systems using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Understand the importance of profiling event-driven systems
Learn how to install and set up FastAPI in your project
Discover various methods for profiling performance within FastAPI
Explore integrating third-party libraries for more advanced profiling features
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for the examples provided in this explainer.
FastAPI version 0.70.0 or higher is recommended to leverage the latest features.
caveats: Profiling techniques may affect performance due to the overhead of additional data collection and processing.
It's essential to test your profiling setup in a development environment before deploying to production.
